description: Flamingo Boxelder is an amazing and eye-catching tree variety that adds a unique flair to any garden. Itâ€™s an elegant and graceful accent tree, with striking, feathery, pink and white foliage and bright pink seedpods in the Autumn. Its heart-shaped leaves are also great for wildlife and provide a natural habitat for birds. In addition to its ornamental beauty, this fast-growing and hardy tree is also quite tough and resistant to disease, pests, and drought. Perfect for small gardens, containers, and street trees, this stunning tree is sure to add a playful and vibrant touch to any outdoor space.
